title: ECHO: Outdoor Power Equipment, Industrial Power & Robotics | ECHO
text: ABOUT US For over 50 years, ECHO has led the way in professional-grade outdoor power equipment. Founded in 1972, we revolutionized the industry with world-firsts like the backpack and handheld blower—setting the standard for performance and innovation. CAREERS Build a career that powers possibilities. At ECHO, you’ll find opportunity, support, and a culture that helps you thrive—professionally and personally.
